name: Swift Justice
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a hero in range with an empty discard. After the attack: If able, that hero performs a movement action on the card they defended with, moving full distance in a straight line.
- Target a unit adjacent to you.

name: Death Seeker
text:
If an enemy hero in radius has a card in the discard, **choose one —**
- **This turn:** You are immune to enemy actions.
- You may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Crimson Trail
text: Before the attack: You may move up to 1 space if there is an empty minion spawn point in radius in the battle zone. Target a unit adjacent to you.

name: Sanguine Path
text: Before the attack: You may move up to 1 space for every empty minion spawn point in radius in the battle zone, up to a maximum of 2 spaces. Target a unit adjacent to you.

name: Blood Fury
text: Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack: If an enemy hero in radius has a card in the discard, may repeat once on a different target.

name: Blood Pilgrimage
text: Before the attack: You may move up to 1 space for every empty minion spawn point in radius in the battle zone, up to a maximum of 3 spaces. Target a unit adjacent to you.

name: Blood Frenzy
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If an enemy hero in radius has a card in the discard, repeat up to five times on different targets.

name: Seeds of Fear
text: Target an enemy unit in radius occupying a spawn point. Move that unit 1 space.

name: Sprouts of Panic
text: Target an enemy unit in radius occupying a spawn point. Move that unit up to 2 spaces.

name: Lesser Evil
text:
An enemy hero in range **chooses one —**
- That hero discards a card, if able.
- You may defeat a minion adjacent to you.

_(Any option can be chosen, even if it would have no effect.)_

name: Blooming Nightmare
text: Target an enemy unit in radius occupying a spawn point. Move that unit up to 3 spaces.

name: Greater Good
text:
An enemy hero in range **chooses one —**
- That hero discards a card, or is defeated.
- You defeat up to 3 minions adjacent to you.

name: Shadow Step
text: Place yourself into an empty minion spawn point in range in the battle zone.

name: Shadow Walk
text: Place yourself into an empty minion spawn point in range in the battle zone.

name: Creeping Shadow
text: Place yourself into an empty minion spawn point in range in the battle zone, or into a space in range adjacent to such a spawn point.

name: Vile Accusation
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a hero in range with an empty discard. After the attack: If able, that hero performs a movement action on the card they defended with, moving full distance in a straight line.
- Target a hero adjacent to you.

name: Cruel Twist
text: Swap with a unit adjacent to you, or with an enemy hero in range with a card in the discard. Move up to 2 spaces.

name: Sealed Fate
text: Swap with a unit adjacent to you, or with an enemy hero in range with a card in the discard. Move up to 3 spaces.

name: Grim Reaper
text: When performing basic actions, you may choose one, or both.
